cc.moveable_type

Class ChineseCharacterMovableTypeWen

  • java.lang.Object
    • cc.moveable_type.ChineseCharacterMovableType
      • cc.moveable_type.ChineseCharacterMovableTypeWen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    漢字組建活字
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AreaMovableTypeWen, ImageMoveableTypeWen, PieceMovableTypeWen

    public class ChineseCharacterMovableTypeWen
extends ChineseCharacterMovableType
    漢字活字樹狀結構的葉子。「獨體為文，合體為字」，樹狀結構中的葉子為文，其他上層節點為字。 ChineseCharacterMovableTypeWen 記錄活字的排版資訊。
    Author:
    Ihc
